charges.charge_description: 21 : 841 (a)(1)&;846 :  knowingly &; unlawfully possess with intent to distribute a controlled substance listed under Schedule I &;  II  of the controlled substance act to wit approximately  128.1  grams of 3.4-methylenedioxmethamphetamine (ecstacy, 422.5 pills) and 2.66 kilograms of Cocaine    Furthermore the defendant did knowingly and unlawfully conspire to possess with intent to distribute the above listed type of drug.
Conspiracy to Import Cocaine and 3,4-methylenedioxymethamphetamine, commonly known Ecstasy.  Penalty: 0 to 20 Years and/or $1 Million Fine; $100 CVF; At Least a 3 Yr TSR(1)
Importation of Cocaine and 3, 4-methylenedioxymethamphetamine, commonly known Ecstasy.  Penalty: 0 to 20 Years and/or $1 Million Fine; $100 CVF; At Least a 3 Yr TSR.(2)
